Because of this, when you are 
breastfeeding it is sensible to 
avoid drinking alcohol.
If you drink alcohol or take 
other drugs and breastfeed, 
it	can	affect	your	baby	in	a	
number of ways:
• your milk may smell 
different	and	put	your	baby	
off	feeding;
• the alcohol may make your 
baby too sleepy to feed;
• your baby may have 
difficulties	with	digestion	
and problems with their 
sleeping patterns.
